hero.title: About KeepFocus
hero.subtitle: The privacy-first Pomodoro timer that helps you focus better, work smarter, and achieve more without compromising your data.

keepfocus.title: What is KeepFocus?
keepfocus.subtitle: KeepFocus is a modern Pomodoro timer and task management app that runs entirely in your browser. Built with privacy in mind, it helps you focus using the proven Pomodoro technique.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro Technique
pomodoro.description: 25-minute focus sessions followed by 5-minute breaks. Proven method to improve concentration and productivity.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.description: Organize your work with a simple task list. Track pomodoros completed per task and stay organized.

focus.title: Distraction-Free
focus.description: Clean, minimal interface designed to reduce distractions and help you maintain focus on what matters most.

professionals.title: Professionals
professionals.description: Manage work tasks, meetings, and projects with focused time blocks

students.title: Students
students.description: Study sessions, homework, and research with better time management

anyone.title: Anyone
anyone.description: Anyone wanting to improve focus and build better work habits

technical.title: Built for Privacy & Performance
technical.subtitle: KeepFocus is designed with your privacy and productivity in mind. All data stays on your device, with no accounts or tracking required.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: All your tasks and settings are stored locally in your browser. No cloud sync, no data collection.

webWorkers.title: Background Timers
webWorkers.description: Uses Web Workers to ensure timers continue running even when the tab is in the background.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: No analytics, no tracking, no accounts. Your productivity data belongs to you alone.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.localData: All data stored locally in your browser
privacy.noAccounts: No user accounts or registration required
privacy.offline: Works completely offline after first load

transparency.title: Full Transparency
